The push result is not stored to the BuildRecord that the user pushed.
eg. we have ID10-NO_REQUIRED, the result is stored to the previous ID9.
Should the exception be thrown (not_allowed) in case of single build?
Also consider the case:
ID10-NO_REQUIRED

user force rebuild to record ID11
